labels.subcribe_content: Receive Email notifications about our latest app updates and product lines.
labels.company_address: No.1, Lo 4E, Trung Yen 10B, Yen Hoa, Cau Giay, Hanoi
labels.compay_name: IInformation Technology Service System Development Co., Ltd
labels.compay_sologan: With the goal of "Bringing optimal value to customers and partners", we create a digital office ecosystem with full modules and functions aimed at comprehensive digital transformation of office activities. , optimize costs & support business administration and management.

banner.title: Digital office solutions
banner.subtitle: A comprehensive digital transformation ecosystem for the Office block. Automate business processes, store information, data, records... on a digital platform.

features.nen_tang_doanh_nghiep_desc: Digital transformation of all office block operations, fully customizable solution. Helping businesses become different in operations, optimizing resources and achieving business goals.
features.tiet_kiem_chi_phi_desc: Minimize office costs such as printing, searching, hardware and software infrastructure investment costs. Shorten the time of document rotation and storage.
features.van_hanh_tu_dong_desc: User-customizable operating procedures. Support businesses to operate automatically, independent of space and time.
features.tiet_kiem_thong_minh_desc: Provides a powerful, optimized search engine suite. Data is aggregated, layered according to information fields with real time

dieu_hanh_quan_tri.title: Operations & Administration
dieu_hanh_quan_tri.subtitle: Provide a digital platform to support the operation, operation and management of enterprises.

features.ky_so_dien_tu_desc: Used in electronic transactions, signing anytime, anywhere easily, safely, securely and quickly, ensuring the same legal value as when using traditional signing methods.
features.dieu_hanh_van_ban_desc: Initialize and update work progress continuously; Easily track, evaluate and manage work performance; There is a reminder mode, automatic warning when processing is due.
features.quan_ly_cong_viec_desc: Initialize and update work progress continuously; Easily track, evaluate and manage work performance; There is a reminder mode, automatic warning when processing is due.
features.quy_trinh_lam_viec_desc: Building a synchronous and fast process for all business activities; Solve the problem of inefficient business operation, many errors and cumbersome when there is a lack of standard processes.
features.hop_dong_dien_tu_desc: Sign contracts online anytime, anywhere; Meet convenience, speed and transparency when signing contracts remotely; Applicable to all types of electronic contracts/documents/transactions.
features.tin_tuc_truyen_thong_desc: Building a centralized internal information channel, conveying the vision and mission of the enterprise to all members of the company; Connecting people and retaining talent.
features.lich_hop_cong_tac_desc: Proactive and flexible in scheduling; Manage and store history, meeting minutes, meeting decisions, from which to use as a basis for implementing other business activities.

quan_ly_van_phong.title: Office manager
quan_ly_van_phong.subtitle: Comprehensive support for office management: optimizing office resources, providing a centralized digital library, applying technology to monitor and evaluate office activities.

features.van_phong_pham_desc: Helps to save the maximum cost of stationery; Utilities for users to actively request necessary office supplies.
features.camera_ai_desc: Cung cấp hệ thống camera thông minh sử dụng trí tuệ nhân tạo, tích hợp chấm công, giám sát bằng nhận diện khuôn mặt.
features.tai_lieu_so_desc: Support to store documents and records of enterprises in a centralized manner; Shorten search time. Smart storage, easy sharing.
features.quan_ly_tai_san_desc: Asset management, asset inventory, adjustment of increase, decrease, transfer of assets between departments.
features.dang_ky_cong_tac_desc: Simplify the registration of business trips, advance travel expenses; trip reports. Keep track of all activities related to the schedule before, during and after work.
features.cong_tac_phi_desc: Đề xuất công tác phí một cách dễ dàng, nhanh chóng; Minh bạch trong hạch toán công tác phí, là thước đo chi phí phát sinh của doanh nghiệp.

nhan_su_ke_toan.title: Human Resources - Accounting - Salary
nhan_su_ke_toan.subtitle: Assist with human resource management tasks such as recruitment, training, and personnel evaluation. Calculating employee salaries, bonuses, and income taxes.

features.quan_ly_nhan_su_desc: Establish the entire recruitment, training, evaluation and development process; Centralize all employees' information; Provide reports and forecast personnel changes.
features.cham_cong_desc: Automatically update timekeeping information; Record, exchange and transparently display timekeeping; Integrate with a variety of timekeepers or AI Cameras.
features.bang_cong_desc: Forecast salary budget, automatically calculate accurate salary, business salary, package salary, product salary.
features.danh_gia_KPI_desc: The management software evaluates KPI accurately, transparently, improving the working productivity of the whole enterprise.
features.phan_mem_ke_toan_desc: BSSD's accounting software can handle tax accounting and internal accounting problems.
features.hoa_don_dien_tu_desc: Invoice data is secure and integrated with existing accounting software on the market.

tien_ich_khac.title: Other facilities
tien_ich_khac.subtitle: Provide other add-ons for businesses in branding and enhancing the experience internally and externally.

features.tuong_tac_desc: Support messaging, calling, commenting, exchanging, ... right on the platform of the business, helping to increase work processing efficiency and record the entire history of interacting with customers, internal interactions .
features.quan_ly_yeu_cau_desc: Create and receive requests from all sources; Sort, sort and transfer to required department for quick resolution; Easily monitor the whole process; Update results and evaluate request processing.
features.khao_sat_desc: Support businesses to create survey forms for their own units in a simple way, customizing according to the subjects participating in the survey (internal surveys and customer surveys).
features.quan_ly_doi_tac_desc: Provide partner information management, easy search, classification and tracking of potential customers, thereby having a better customer care plan.

khach_hang_chon.title: "Why do customers choose us"
khach_hang_chon.subtitle: We bring maximum value to customers and partners.

features.nen_tang_cong_nghe_desc: The solution is built on the latest technology platform, in line with the trend of digital transformation: Cloud base, Mobility, AI ... Ensure safety, security, data integrity
features.on_dinh_an_toan_desc: Solutions for stable operation according to SLA commitments to each business and customer; All data is stored safely, securely and can be accessed anytime, anywhere.
features.giao_dien_tuong_thich_desc: Stable operation on all current popular platforms (Web, Mobile, Tablet). There is an installation version on iOS and Android.
features.ho_tro_247_desc: We have a 24/7 customer support team. In case you have questions about the product, please contact us immediately.
